content:
Hello,
What do you think of this approach to translate queries between the two query languages AQL and CQL ? : http://ebooks.iospress.nl/publication/51962

As a high-level first pass, it seems like a good approach, taking into account the differences between the capabilities of the two. I'm going to have to dig deeper, very interesting, thank you for posting!
Thanks for the link, great paper. Seems like an interesting and important topic
